brand_identity.name: Schützenzug Manager
brand_identity.description: A light, playful, yet efficient management tool for a modern shooting club. It blends the tradition of the 'Schützenverein' with the cleanliness of a modern SaaS.
design_principles: Fusion: Traditional Green mixed with High-Tech Orange
Clarity: Data (Fines) must be instant to read
Playfulness: Ranking is a game, not a spreadsheet

grid_system.kpi_section: col-span-12 md:col-span-8 grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-6

cards.style: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-stone-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: h-11 px-8 rounded-full bg-emerald-700 text-white font-medium hover:bg-emerald-800 transition-transform active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-emerald-700/20
buttons.secondary: h-11 px-6 rounded-full bg-white border border-stone-200 text-stone-700 hover:bg-stone-50 transition-colors
buttons.accent: h-11 px-8 rounded-full bg-orange-500 text-white font-bold tracking-wide hover:bg-orange-600 hover:shadow-orange-500/30 transition-all uppercase text-sm

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-xl border-stone-200 bg-stone-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-emerald-500/20 focus:border-emerald-500 transition-all font-medium text-stone-900

login_background.usage: Full screen background for login page with overlay

sau.description: Use a Lucide Icon 'PiggyBank' or similar, styled in Pink

laemmchen.description: Use a Lucide Icon 'Smile' or 'Star', styled in Stone/White

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic gradients. Use flat, clean colors or subtle textures.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'Manrope' font for all body text. Import it from Google Fonts.
All cards must have 'rounded-2xl' or 'rounded-3xl'. No sharp corners.
The 'Add Fine' button must be the most prominent element on the Dashboard (Orange).
Ensure high contrast for accessibility, even with the light theme.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts: `npm install @fontsource/outfit @fontsource/manrope`. 2. Update `tailwind.config.js` to include these fonts and the custom color palette. 3. Build the Dashboard using the 'Bento' layout strategy defined above. 4. Implement the 'Sau' and 'Lämmchen' logic in the Statistics page. 5. Use the provided Unsplash image for the Login page background.
